question: 欲求
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: What you <kanji>want</kanji> and <kanji>request</kanji> are your <vocabulary>wants</vocabulary>, your <vocabulary>desires</vocabulary>, perhaps your <vocabulary>craving</vocabulary>. You want these things so you request them. I wants them!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. <ja>よく</ja> goes to <ja>よっ</ja>, so be careful not to want the wrong reading.
